refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the current tempo at k-rate, of either the MIDI file (if available) or the score

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the current tempo at k-rate, of either the MIDI file (if available) or the score

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the miditempo opcode. It uses the files miditempo.csd.
Example of the miditempo opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
Its output should include a line like this:
miditempo = 96
